name: Nightmare Grotto
description: Nightmare Grotto is a horror-themed monster wave shooter for the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift. How long can you survive?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
